attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Countryside Alliance petition for the repeal of hunting live mammals to a shocking death in no way offers the government the correct overview of those members of the British electorate lucky enough to live in the countryside.
I have lived in Suffolk all my life, my ancestors before me, and I certainly NEVER want to see the return of the killers in red coats and their voyeuristic followers trailing feebly behind them. They breed foxes to hunt because there aren't enough - I've seen the empty Sainsbury's chicken packs besides earths in Cambridgeshire and I've got the evidence.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
